attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Creates a label for a form item.

attributes.name: labelsize
attributes.description: Set a regular or large label size.

attributes.name: helptext
attributes.description: Help text displayed under the form field to provide an additional explanation.

attributes.name: error
attributes.description: Error text displayed under the form field. Leave blank to indicate valid field.

attributes.name: requirement
attributes.description: Marks the field with optional/required label.

attributes.name: maxwidth
attributes.description: Sets the maximum width of the form item.
